extended_input_schema.hint: Base URI is https://slack.com/api/ - path will be appended to this URI. Use absolute URI to override this base URI.

If a section has already been added, add a divider first

block.name: search_entries

extended_input_schema.name: parameters
extended_input_schema.label: Search by
extended_input_schema.hint: Provide one or more entry fields to search the entry

block.comment: Get all the possible buttons for this section

block.name: insert_to_list
block.title: Add item to section_buttons list
block.comment: Add the button to the list for this section.

This step makes sure the user has the permission for this button.  1 - Check to see if a permission is not required for this button.  2 - Check for the global permission (if the button permission is itbot.ess.search_engine, do a regex match for /^itbot\.ess\.\*/  3 - Check for the exact permission.  If any of the 3 are true then the user gets this button.

Make sure the user is assigned the permission for this section (or that there is no permission needed to see this section).  NOTE - in order to use datapills in REGEX, you need to wrap with #{( )}.  Additionally I add ^ to ensure you start the match at the beginning and add a period match so that partial permission matches don't happen.
Loop through each Section to see if it should be added to the user's home tab

blocks.image_title: You do not have access to any of the IT Bot buttons or sections.  Please contact the help desk to get access to your requested action.

extended_input_schema.name: path
extended_input_schema.label: Path
extended_input_schema.hint: Base URI is https://slack.com/api/ - path will be appended to this URI. Use absolute URI to override this base URI.

block.comment: If this user does not have access to any sections/buttons, then display an unauthorized message
